keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reduce the pressure on the tight school places.
Campaign to save our local NHS services.
Campaign for Council Homes & affordable housing and to hold the developers to account on Building on or around council estates.
Guarantee the rights of EU citizens.

issues.education: Reduce the pressure on the tight school places.
issues.health: Campaign to save our local NHS services.
